import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade'; export default function Section(props){ return(

{props.title}

{props.tagline}

 {props.btn1} {props.btn2 && {props.btn2} } {props.chevron && }
) } const Main = styled.section` background-image: url(${props => props.bg}); ` const Module = styled.div`` const Buttons = styled.div`` const Btn1 = styled.button`` const Btn2 = styled(Btn1)`` const Chevron = styled.div`` const CTAButton = styled.div``
